name: AI Ban Spam Comment
author: naimgr83

sections.description:
This plugin uses the OpenAI gpt-4o and gpt-4-turbo models to analyze and filter comments made on your texts. You can choose to have spam comments either deleted without being added to your database or saved as junk comments.Optionally approve only positive comments. To use the plugin, you just need to enter your OpenAI key.

REQUIRES:

  • PHP 7.2 or higher
  • WordPress 5.0.x or higher
sections.installation: Upload the AI Ban Spam Comment plugin to your blog and activate
